import React, { Component } from "react"; import supprimer from "./Icones_Arigoni/icone_supprimer.png"; import modifier from "./Icones_Arigoni/icone_modifier.png"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import "./debiteurs"; import Axios from "axios"; //import formulairedebiteurs et formulairecreacier pour les routes class Creanciers extends Component { state = { creanciers: [], creanciersFiltered: [] }; componentDidMount() { Axios.get("http://localhost:4848/api/creanciers") .then(response => { this.setState({ creanciers: response.data }); // console.log(this.state.creanciers); }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }); const myFilteredCreanciers = () => { let creanciers = this.state.creanciers; console.log("creanciers:" + creanciers); let filteredCreanciers = creanciers.filter( creancier => creancier.active === true ); console.log("filteredCreanciers:" + filteredCreanciers); this.setState({ creanciersFiltered: filteredCreanciers }); }; setTimeout(myFilteredCreanciers(), 3000); } render() { return ( //tableau informations des crÃ©anciers
